name: Motor-Bike Drag Racing Hero - Real Driving Simulator Road Race Rivals Game
name_original: Motor-Bike Drag Racing Hero - Real Driving Simulator Road Race Rivals Game
description:
Get ready to dodge the cops and use your biking skills to outsmart them. There will be extra high ramps so you perform amazing jumps and stunts, super cool bonuses to speed you up or protect your two wheels from crashing. Avoid all car wrecks and don’t get caught by the police!

You can choose from 8 stunning motorcycles: low ride choppers, city smart nakeds, insanely fast super bikes and many more. Each is different in terms of speed, strength and difficulty, so choose wisely and prove that you can tame all of them!

Game features:

- great selection of bikes
- beautiful graphics
- mazing locations
- intense gameplay
- fantastic special effects
